title: Chao Neng Lifang
synopsis: In an accident, Wang Xiaoxiu, an ordinary teenager, obtains a space system "Super Cube" from a high-latitude cosmic civilization, thus possessing extraordinary abilities. After being confessed to by Shen Yao, the schoolgirl whom he has long been in love with, Wang Xiaoxiu annoys Sun Jun, an undesirable young man who is also Shen Yao's suitor. Wang Xiaoxiu relies on his resourcefulness and extraordinary ability to defuse the crisis, but it also leads to more trouble. Shen Yao is taken by a mysterious man to the world of extraordinary people, and Wang Xiaoxiu embarks on a journey to save Shen Yao. Together with Xiao Xiu, he fights in the world of light and strange, interpreting fairness and justice on his way to becoming a supremely powerful man!
